version_description:
New stuff!

- Tell us what you’re into and we’re going to give content you’ll love
- Wound up in the wrong country? Visiting someplace else? You can now switch countries

Fixes:

- Bug squashing galore!

New stuff!

- The browsing section will now get reordered based on you interests

- A card logo went into the woods and never returned, we hired a new one
- Caught a crash which was bothering people
- small bugfixes
All roads lead to MVP

Are you ready for  747 Warehouse St? Los Angeles, February 16th-17th. An event in basketball culture. 2 days of creativity featuring exclusive drops, athlete appearances, customization and live music. The adidas app is here with all the details about the event.

- Our checkout got a speed boost
- Bug fixes
Some products were crashing the app. Not anymore.
We upped our game and smashed a lot of bugs.

- The checkout went on an Olympic sprinter training regiment
- The app got a style upgrade

- You can now filter search results with more options
- Our size charts got beautified
- A lot of small improvements and bug-fixes

- Sign up for new releases and get a head start

We are ready for the FIFA World Cup 2018. Are you?

We are ready for the World Cup. Are you?

We’ve given the app a speed power up
We've cleaned up some of our old shoes and made way for new an shiny things

Update to upgrade your adidas experience!

Get your exclusive sneaker fix from the adidas app, the one stop source of sneaker drops.
We’ve rebuilt the adidas app from the ground up so you can find your favourite kicks in style
You can now add your favorite products to the shopping cart and save for later list blazingly fast
You can now see the details of the products you’ve added to your shopping cart by tapping on them
See snapshots of the latest releases in every category
Get even more personalized content from creators like yourself
Fixed an issue with chat crashing for some users
Fixed an issue in Canada causing users to not be able to purchase via Apple Pay

Welcome to the adidas membership program for true creators. Earn points to level up and gain access to limited edition sneakers, special events and other great rewards. It’s easy. It’s free. It’s time to create.

Get your exclusive sneakers from the adidas app, the one stop source of sneaker drops

You can now add your favourite products to the shopping cart and save for later list blazingly fast
You can now see the details of the products you’ve added to your shopping cart by tapping on them
See snapshots of the latest releases in every category
Get even more personalised content from creators like yourself

- We went out and bought a new map so we now can correctly save your address, sorry about that.
- We've taken out some of our speedbumps so you can enjoy browsing the app at full speed
- We've taken out our toolbox and fixed the plumbing of our search engine so filtering works again
- We tracked down a nasty crash which was stopping you from telling us your preferred sizes

- Our change password button came back from a it’s short vacation

Nite Jogger brings hi-vis detailing and BOOST technology together in one silhouette for creators who know it’s never too late to pursue their vision. Introducing Nite Cam. A reflective filter that enhances the night. Only on the adidas app. Create and get rewarded. Share how you style your Nite Joggers to earn points and get featured on our site.

Every year, an estimated 8 million tons of plastic enter the world’s oceans. That means every minute, the equivalent of a full garbage truck of trash is dumped into the sea. And by 2050, scientists say the world’s oceans will have more plastic in them than fish. Even today, marine plastic is a massive problem because fish try to eat it and die, which unbalances the food chain, damaging our delicate global ecosystem. Run For The Oceans is our response. Join the movement in the adidas app now. Every kilometer recorded = $1 for Parley Ocean School to educate our youth on how to tackle the marine pollution problem, capped at $1.5 million. There’s no set distance you have to run, no set route you have to follow. Register for free and be a part of the movement.

JOIN HOMETEAM
In times like these, it's about being creative with how we take care of not only each other, but ourselves - keeping our hearts, bodies and minds healthy. Find out more by downloading the app.

JOIN HOMETEAM

#HOMETEAM is a community of athletes and creators from all over the world, sharing skills, training, and advice to help us all keep moving and stay hopeful and healthy in body and mind.
Join the team.
Together is how we get through this.
Find out more by downloading the app.

In this global health crisis, we all need to do our part. Every action matters, and working as a team, we can make a big impact for those who need it the most.

From April 18th - May 16th, 2020, adidas and Reebok will donate an additional €2 for every item purchased over €20 from our online sites or mobile apps to the COVID-19 Solidarity Response Fund.

In this global health crisis, we all need to do our part. Every action matters, and working as a team, we can make a big impact for those who need it the most.

From April 18th - May 16th, 2020, adidas and Reebok will donate an additional $2 for every item purchased over $20 from our online sites or mobile apps to the COVID-19 Solidarity Response Fund.
